creator: Kraftwerk 9 Inc.
descriptionHtml:
TV Remote for Vizio is designed specifically to control Vizio SmartCast TVs. Just connect your phone and a TV to the same Wi-Fi network and you will be able to control the TV using a mobile device after a simple pairing routine.

The app features all the necessary buttons. You no longer have to look for your TV remote control or buy a new one in order to replace the one broken down.

Key features:
- Fully functional remote control for Vizio Smart TV;
- A large touchpad for convenient menu and content navigation;
- Keyboard;
- Automatic connection to a device;

Compatibility:
TV Remote for Vizio is not compatible with Vizio SmartCast TVs released before 2016 and with legacy Vizio Internet Apps Smart TVs.

Disclaimer:
Kraftwerk 9, Inc is not an affiliated entity of Vizio Inc, and TV Remote application is not an official product of Vizio.

appDetails.developerAddress: Suite 508, Marina Towers, Newtown Barracks, Belize City, Belize

title: Remote Control for Vizio TV

container.value: Suite 508, Marina Towers, Newtown Barracks, Belize City, Belize

creator: Kraftwerk 9 Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Turn your phone into a VIZIO TV remote. Control playback of the content in the apps with dedicated playback buttons, search with your mobile keyboard. Interact with your TV using a touchpad and navigation buttons.

Mobile remote allows you to unlock all power of the Visio SmartCast TVs. The app features all the necessary buttons. You no longer have to look for your TV remote or buy a new one in order to replace the one broken down.

The application works and looks almost like the original hardware. It has a simple and convenient interface and will help you to reveal all the possibilities of your Smart TV.

Key features:
- Fully functional Vizio Remote Control;
- A large touchpad for menu and content navigation;
- Native keyboard;
- Automatic connection to a device;
-Wear OS;

This app supports auto-connection. Now you don't need to connect manually each time to your TV.

Compatibility:
This app is not compatible with devices released before 2016 and with legacy Internet Apps Smart TVs. The app supports all new models with SmartCast: OLED, Series "P", "M" and "V".
